title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Bridging from POC to production: An intro to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (AIM2204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从概念验证到生产环境：Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 入门 (AIM2204)
abstract: Going from a pilot to a secure, scalable, and reliable agent system requires more than great prompts. In session, we'll show how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore helps teams move from proof-of-concept to production using enterprise-grade services, including Runtime, Gateway, Identity, Memory, Observability, Code Interpreter, and Browser. Learn how these services simplify development, reduce operational burden, and improve time-to-value. You'll get best practices from the technical team at Ericsson, and we'll cover foundational capabilities like enterprise readiness, tool integration, and performance at scale, providing a blueprint for success no matter where you are in your journey.
abstract_cn: 从试点到安全、可扩展且可靠的智能体系统需要的不仅仅是优秀的提示词。在本次会议中，我们将展示Amazon Bedrock AgentCore如何帮助团队使用企业级服务从概念验证转向生产环境，包括运行时、网关、身份认证、内存、可观测性、代码解释器和浏览器。了解这些服务如何简化开发、减少运营负担并提升价值实现时间。您将获得爱立信技术团队的最佳实践，我们还将涵盖企业就绪性、工具集成和大规模性能等基础能力，为您在智能体开发旅程中的任何阶段提供成功蓝图。
